com.scalar.ledger.request

Class ContractExecutionRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scalar.ledger.request.ContractExecutionRequest

  • @Immutable
public class ContractExecutionRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    A request for contract execution.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a ContractExecutionRequest with the specified contract id, argument, certificate holder ID, certificate version and signature of the request.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContractExecutionRequest

        public ContractExecutionRequest(java.lang.String contractId,
                                com.google.gson.JsonObject argument,
                                java.lang.String certHolderId,
                                int certVersion,
                                byte[] signature)
        Constructs a ContractExecutionRequest with the specified contract id, argument, certificate holder ID, certificate version and signature of the request.
        Parameters:
        contractId - a contract id of a registered contract to execute
        argument - an argument to a contract
        certHolderId - a certificate holder id
        certVersion - a certificate version
        signature - a signature of the request

      • validateWith

        public boolean validateWith(SignatureValidator validator)
                     throws java.security.SignatureException
        Validates if the request is not tampered.
        Parameters:
        validator - a SignatureValidator
        Returns:
        true if the request is valid and not tampered otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.security.SignatureException - if the request is invalid

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this object. The other object is considered equal if:
        • it is the same instance and
        • it is also an CertificateRegistrationRequest and
        • both instances have the same contract id, argument, certificate holder id, certificate version and signature.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - an object to be tested for equality
        Returns:
        true if the other object is "equal to" this object otherwise false
